summary: A Sicilian nobleman is very jealous of his mistress and when she gets married flies off his handle and commits a murder of which an innocent man is accused. He is however tormented by his ... See full summary Â»
cast: Erno Crisa|Marisa Belli|Vincenzo Musolino|Liliana Gerace|Alessandro Fersen|Grazia Spadaro|Maresa Gallo|Gustavo De Nardo|Pasquale Martino|Renato Pinciroli|Amedeo Trilli|Guido Medici|Loriana Varoli|Giovanni Martella|Assunta Radico|Paola Borboni|Italia Dini|Gustavo Serena
title: Gelosia
